PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-11082013-10-24EC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Renewable Fuels Regulations, 2013
PrecisRegulations Amending the RENEWABLE FUELS REGULATIONS, 2013 in order to (1) mitigate cost increases for Canadians that use oil to heat their homes; (2) allow a six-month extension to the exemption for the Maritime provinces from the 2 % renewable content requirement in both diesel fuel and heating distillate oil to give regulatees supplying distillates to the Maritime provinces extra time to comply with the regulatory requirements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0187 Publication Date: 2013-11-06
AttachmentsAttachment
